title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 R34 Server
description:
R34 SERVER: (This is version with proper config, ready to run...)
1. Download and replace latest small "dinput8.dll" from: http://forums.emulatornexus.com/bf/
2. Change config files in "Instance" folder if you want. (Name server, BC2 or VIETNAM etc...)
3. Run "~StartServer.bat" and enjoy on your own server :)

R11 CLIENT:
4. You need:
- BFBC2 oryginal CD or from here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5396298/Battlefield_Bad_Company_2-RELOADED
- Oryginal 2.5GB patch (remove CD-check and add "VIETNAM"): BFBC2_PC_Client_R11_795745_Patch.exe (md5:b9c7e7f9dd792ffe1f1aec4853089145)
- "dinput8.dll" must be placed in root folder on both, client and server.
- Create an account on http://forums.emulatornexus.com/bf/ for your BFBC2 client login information and working server browser.
